nodes.text: "New Recruits and Rebel Guns" is a mini four-part adventure in Instant Adventures, published in 1996 by West End Games for their Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game line. The adventure was written by Peter M. Schweighofer.

Several spacers, going through a mutual friend, are recruited into the Rebel Alliance. They meet up with partisans on a Mid Rim spaceport, where they are tasked with bringing a transport full of supplies to the Sector Command base.
